Functions
misc_fnc_getFullCrew

Determines which crew this vehicle can have.

Parameters: _vehicle

_vehicle

object handle of class name

Returns: [_n_driver, _copilotTurrets, _stdTurrets, _psgTurrets, _nCargo] _n_driver - Number, 0 or 1, if there's a driver(pilot) or not _copilotTurrets - copilot's turret path _stdTurrets - standard(with AI inside by default) turret paths excluding the copilot turret.  _psgTurrets - passenger turrets (FFVs).  _n_cargo - Number, number or passenger seats in cargo (non-FFV).

Params: ["_n_driver", "_copilotTurrets", "_stdTurrets", "_psgTurrets", "_n_cargo"]
